title._content: Series of photographs showing the Westchester County Thrift Shop and the many activities conducted ...

description._content: Collection: Human Ecology Historical Photographs Title: Series of photographs showing the Westchester County Thrift Shop and the many activities conducted there. Date is 1921. There is some question that this item relates directly to this series, but it was identified as such in the original information, and therefore is included. It actually appears to be a county agent calling on a family. Many of the photographs in this series are very finely composed, and reflect very graphically the spirit of the enterprise. Collection #23-2-749, item AC-ER-22 Div. Rare & Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library Persistent URI: http://hdl.handle.net/1813.001/5wh9 There are no known U.S. copyright restrictions on this image. The digital file is owned by the Cornell University Library which is making it freely available with the request that, when possible, the Library be credited as its source.
